thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1824
thread.title: Katherine

author: Katherine
title: Katherine
text:
My retirement earnings are hard-earned and so when I fly I always look for ways to save some of that hard-earned cash. It's been my experience that FlightHub - although not always able to get my flights for my budget - I seem to always go back to this site.
As the rating says - 4 out of 5 is pretty good.
My understanding of life is - 'nobody's perfect' we always strive to be better.
